Multidisciplinary HT teams must counsel patients and families on appropriate preventative measures. In 1 epidemiological study in China of 87 HT recipients, 97% adopted prevention and quarantine measures with a low rate of infection.
5 We should recognize that given their immunosuppressed states, these patients may have both typical (respiratory) and atypical (gastrointestinal) COVID-19 illness. For HT patients admitted with COVID-19 infection, some have advocated for reduced immunosuppression and moderate-dose IV steroids.
